caption: Willis Reed
infobox-image: Willis Reed 1972 publicity photo.jpg | Reed with the New York Knicks in 1972

Career information: Selected by the New York Knicks

Career highlights and awards: 2× NBA champion (1970, 1973) | 2× NBA Finals MVP (1970, 1973) | NBA Most Valuable Player (1970) | 7× NBA All-Star (1965-1971) | NBA All-Star Game MVP (1970) | All-NBA First Team (1970) | 4× All-NBA Second Team (1967-1969, 1971) | NBA All-Defensive First Team (1970) | NBA Rookie of the Year (1965) | NBA All-Rookie Team (1965) | NBA anniversary team (50th, 75th) | No. 19 retired by New York Knicks

Pan American Games: Gold medal - first place | 1963 São Paulo | Team Competition
